title: Roasted Mint and Lemon Veg
ingredients: ['3 carrots, (and whatever other veg ya want)', '4 cloves of garlic', '2 tbsps olive oil,', 'onion seasoning (or onions but I hate chopping them so this is a great alternative),', 'mint,', 'black pepper,', 'juice of 2 slices of lemon,', 'mixed herbs.']
